text: Ohio University is a public university in Athens, Ohio. The university has about 25,908 students. It was founded in 1804. The current president of the university is Lori Stewart Gonzalez. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Bobcats. They have 16 varsity teams and they compete in the Mid-American Conference. ==Other websites== *Ohio University's Official website *Ohio Bobcats' Official athletics website Category:Mid-American Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:1804 establishments in the United States Category:1800s establishments in Ohio
title: Ohio University
